parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es, ISketchPoint s, and/or IRefPoint s

title: IPrimaryMemberPointLengthFeatureData.SetPoints
description: Sets the vertexes, sketch points, and reference points.

parameters.name: Points
parameters.description: Array of IVertex es, ISketchPoint s, and/or IRefPoint s

returns: True if points successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Use
IPrimaryMemberPointLengthFeatureData::UnChainPointsAndLength
to specify whether to chain link members along a chain of points.
